problem_statement: Many BMI calculators are too basic, lack clarity, and provide poor user experience, especially for users unfamiliar with health metrics. They often fail to support both Metric and Imperial units properly, offer little validation or explanation of results, and do not retain user data. There is a need for a front-endâ€“only, responsive BMI calculator that accurately computes BMI, clearly categorizes results, visualizes BMI ranges, and stores data locally, helping users better understand and track their body health in a simple and accessible way.
FAIL_TO_PASS: useBmiCalculator.test.ts - BMI Calculation - Metric System - should calculate BMI correctly for normal weight (metric)
useBmiCalculator.test.ts - BMI Calculation - Metric System - should calculate BMI correctly for underweight (metric)
useBmiCalculator.test.ts - BMI Calculation - Metric System - should calculate BMI correctly for overweight (metric)
useBmiCalculator.test.ts - BMI Calculation - Metric System - should calculate BMI correctly for obese (metric)
useBmiCalculator.test.ts - BMI Calculation - Metric System - should round BMI to 1 decimal place
useBmiCalculator.test.ts - BMI Calculation - Imperial System - should calculate BMI correctly for normal weight (imperial)
useBmiCalculator.test.ts - BMI Categorization - WHO Standards - should categorize BMI < 18.5 as Underweight
useBmiCalculator.test.ts - BMI Categorization - WHO Standards - should categorize BMI 18.5-24.9 as Normal
useBmiCalculator.test.ts - BMI Categorization - WHO Standards - should categorize BMI 25-29.9 as Overweight
useBmiCalculator.test.ts - BMI Categorization - WHO Standards - should categorize BMI >= 30 as Obese
useBmiCalculator.test.ts - Healthy Weight Range Calculation - should calculate healthy weight range correctly (metric)
useBmiCalculator.test.ts - Healthy Weight Range Calculation - should calculate healthy weight range correctly (imperial)
useBmiCalculator.test.ts - Unit Conversion - Metric to Imperial Conversion - should convert height from cm to feet/inches
useBmiCalculator.test.ts - Unit Conversion - Metric to Imperial Conversion - should convert weight from kg to lbs
useBmiCalculator.test.ts - Unit Conversion - Metric to Imperial Conversion - should maintain calculation accuracy after conversion
useBmiCalculator.test.ts - Input Validation - Metric System Validation - should require height input
useBmiCalculator.test.ts - Input Validation - Metric System Validation - should require weight input
useBmiCalculator.test.ts - Input Validation - Metric System Validation - should validate height minimum (50 cm)
useBmiCalculator.test.ts - Input Validation - Metric System Validation - should validate height maximum (300 cm)
useBmiCalculator.test.ts - Input Validation - Metric System Validation - should validate weight minimum (2 kg)
useBmiCalculator.test.ts - Input Validation - Metric System Validation - should validate weight maximum (600 kg)
useBmiCalculator.test.ts - Input Validation - Imperial System Validation - should require height input (feet or inches)
useBmiCalculator.test.ts - Input Validation - isValid Computed Property - should return false when inputs are invalid (metric)
useBmiCalculator.test.ts - Input Validation - isValid Computed Property - should return true when inputs are valid (metric)
useLocalStorage.test.ts - Basic Functionality - should initialize with default value when localStorage is empty
useLocalStorage.test.ts - Basic Functionality - should load existing value from localStorage
useLocalStorage.test.ts - Basic Functionality - should save value to localStorage when changed
components.test.ts - FormInputs Component - should render metric inputs by default
components.test.ts - FormInputs Component - should render imperial inputs when unitSystem is imperial
components.test.ts - FormInputs Component - should display error messages when errors are present
components.test.ts - FormInputs Component - should disable calculate button when isValid is false
components.test.ts - FormInputs Component - should enable calculate button when isValid is true
components.test.ts - FormInputs Component - should emit toggle-unit event when unit button is clicked
components.test.ts - ResultCard Component - should display BMI value
components.test.ts - ResultCard Component - should display category badge
components.test.ts - ResultCard Component - should display healthy weight range
components.test.ts - HistoryList Component - should display empty state when history is empty
components.test.ts - HistoryList Component - should display history items
components.test.ts - ThemeToggle Component - should emit update:theme event when clicked
integration.test.ts - Complete Calculation Flow - should calculate BMI and display result (metric)
integration.test.ts - Complete Calculation Flow - should calculate BMI and display result (imperial)
integration.test.ts - Complete Calculation Flow - should add calculation to history
integration.test.ts - Unit Conversion Integration - should convert values when toggling units
integration.test.ts - Unit Conversion Integration - should maintain calculation accuracy after unit conversion
integration.test.ts - Input Validation Integration - should prevent calculation with invalid inputs
integration.test.ts - LocalStorage Persistence Integration - should persist theme preference
integration.test.ts - LocalStorage Persistence Integration - should persist input values
integration.test.ts - LocalStorage Persistence Integration - should restore values from localStorage on mount
integration.test.ts - History Management Integration - should delete individual history entries
integration.test.ts - History Management Integration - should clear all history
requirements.test.ts - Requirement 1 - should allow entering height and weight inputs
requirements.test.ts - Requirement 1 - should calculate BMI when height and weight are entered
requirements.test.ts - Requirement 1 - should display calculated BMI result
requirements.test.ts - Requirement 2 - should support metric units (cm, kg)
requirements.test.ts - Requirement 2 - should support imperial units (ft/in, lb)
requirements.test.ts - Requirement 3 - should convert metric to imperial without resetting
requirements.test.ts - Requirement 3 - should convert imperial to metric without resetting
requirements.test.ts - Requirement 4 - should require height input
requirements.test.ts - Requirement 4 - should validate height minimum (50 cm)
requirements.test.ts - Requirement 5 - should disable calculate button when inputs are invalid
requirements.test.ts - Requirement 5 - should enable calculate button when inputs are valid
requirements.test.ts - Requirement 6 - should round BMI to 1 decimal place
requirements.test.ts - Requirement 7 - should categorize BMI < 18.5 as Underweight
requirements.test.ts - Requirement 7 - should categorize BMI 18.5-24.9 as Normal
requirements.test.ts - Requirement 7 - should categorize BMI 25-29.9 as Overweight
requirements.test.ts - Requirement 7 - should categorize BMI >= 30 as Obese
requirements.test.ts - Requirement 8 - should calculate healthy weight range correctly
requirements.test.ts - Requirement 8 - should display healthy weight range in result card
requirements.test.ts - Requirement 11 - should use Vue 3 Composition API
requirements.test.ts - Requirement 12 - should use only browser localStorage for persistence
PASS_TO_PASS: useBmiCalculator.test.ts - Adversarial Testing - should handle extremely small valid inputs
useBmiCalculator.test.ts - Adversarial Testing - should handle extremely large valid inputs
useBmiCalculator.test.ts - Adversarial Testing - should handle decimal inputs correctly
useLocalStorage.test.ts - Edge Cases and Error Handling - should handle invalid JSON in localStorage gracefully
useLocalStorage.test.ts - Edge Cases and Error Handling - should handle empty string in localStorage
integration.test.ts - Adversarial Integration Scenarios - should handle rapid unit toggling
integration.test.ts - Adversarial Integration Scenarios - should handle multiple rapid calculations
integration.test.ts - Adversarial Integration Scenarios - should handle localStorage corruption gracefully
